articles.title: Pablo Escobar’s brother is now trying to sell refurbished iPhone 11 Pros - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Roberto Escobar, Pablo’s brother had earlier tried to sell re-branded Samsung Galaxy Folds earlier that were ‘gold-plated’ like the iPhone 11 Pros he is trying to sell now for $499

articles.title: Infinix Hot 9, Hot 9 Pro launched in India: Price, specifications and features - India Today
articles.description: The Hong Kong-based smartphone maker Infinix has launched two new phones in the budget segment- the Hot 9 and the Hot 9 Pro today.
